headline: 4 Dividend Stocks Flying Under the Radar That Belong on Your Watchlist Now
summary: Most dividend investors gravitate toward the same familiar names: utilities, consumer staples, REITs. But four companies across very different sectors have been quietly raising dividends at aggressive rates while delivering earnings that consistently beat expectations. Broadridge Financial Solutions (NYSE: BR), Comfort Systems USA (NYSE: FIX), Genpact (NYSE: G), and Monolithic Power Systems (NASDAQ: MPWR) each ... 4 Dividend Stocks Flying Under the Radar That Belong on Your Watchlist Now
